member.name: T:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions
member.summary: Specifies options available for customizing the excel output when grid is exported.

member.name: F:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions.None
member.summary: Represents an option where no options are truly set for row(s) and/or column(s).

member.name: F:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions.VisibleOnly
member.summary: Represents an option that opts-in for rendering only visible row(s) and/or column(s) in the output file.

member.name: F:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions.RenderFrozen
member.summary:
Represents an option that opts-in for rendering the frozen row(s) and/or column(s) in the output file.
If a combination of other flags is used as well, the frozen indexes are affected by that option as well.

member.name: F:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions.SelectedOnly
member.summary:
Represents an option that opts-in for rendering only the selected row(s) and/or column(s) in the output file.
If it is set for only either row(s) or column(s), only row(s) or column(s) that have a selected cell in them will be rendered in the output file. If it is set for both row(s) and column(s), only the cell(s) in the selected range will be rendered in the output file.

member.name: F:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions.ExludeRange
member.summary:
Represents an option that opts-in for treating any explicit ranges as exclusive; meaning those column(s) and/or row(s) in the range will not be rendered in the output file.
By default, any specified range(s) are inclusive; meaning that only those column(s) and/or row(s) in the range will be rendered in the output file.

member.name: F:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions.ExcludeEmpty
member.summary:
Represents an option that opts-in for excluding empty row(s) in the rendered output file.
This only affects row ranges.

member.name: F:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions.RenderGroups
member.summary:
Represents an option that opts-in for including grouped row(s) in the rendered output file.
This only affects row ranges.

member.name: T:C1.Blazor.Grid.Extensions
member.summary: Exposes extension methods to export an instance of FlexGrid in excel format.
Saves the contents of the grid in a desired format using GcExcel
member.param: The grid this method will be used as an extention towards.
A String representing the name of the file to save.
A String representing the worksheet name.
A SaveFileFormat enum value that specifies the format the file should be saved into.
A GridRowColRanges object representing the row settings to be taken into consideration whilst exporting. Could contain specific ranges and/or other flagged options.
A GridRowColRanges object representing the column settings to be taken into consideration whilst exporting. Could contain specific ranges and/or other flagged options.
A GridHeadersVisibility enum value that represents the header visibility options to be taken in consideration whilst exporting.
A Boolean flag denoting whether to render merged ranges in the output.
A Boolean flag denoting whether to render cell values as formatted in the output. If a grid column has a data map and this flag is not true, the rendered output will render the original values.
A Boolean flag denoting whether to render images in the output. If this value is false, their URI's are used instead.
A PrinterSettings object representing all the printer settings to be passed down to the output.

member.summary: Saves the contents of the grid in a desired format using GcExcel
member.param: The grid this method will be used as an extention towards.
A Stream for the output to be written into.
A String representing the worksheet name.
A SaveFileFormat enum value that specifies the format the file should be saved into.
A GridRowColRanges object representing the row settings to be taken into consideration whilst exporting. Could contain specific ranges and/or other flagged options.
A GridRowColRanges object representing the column settings to be taken into consideration whilst exporting. Could contain specific ranges and/or other flagged options.
A GridHeadersVisibility enum value that represents the header visibility options to be taken in consideration whilst exporting.
A Boolean flag denoting whether to render merged ranges in the output.
A Boolean flag denoting whether to render cell values as formatted in the output. If a grid column has a data map and this flag is not true, the rendered output will render the original values.
A Boolean flag denoting whether to render images in the output. If this value is false, their URI's are used instead.
A PrinterSettings object representing all the printer settings to be passed down to the output.

member.name: T:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRanges
member.summary: Represents a wrapper class containing row or column settings that in turn affect the output when a grid is exported though the GcExcel library.

member.name: P:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRanges.Options
member.summary: Gets or Sets the flagged options than in turn affect the rendered output.

member.name: P:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRanges.Ranges
member.summary:
Gets the specified ranges to be included or excluded in the rendered output.
This is a read-only value and it returns the string version of the internal RangedSet.

member.name: M:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRanges.#ctor(C1.Blazor.Core.C1OrderedSet,C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of GridRowColRanges with where both the inclusive range and the flagged options are passed as a parameter.
member.param: The ranges specified as a .
The flagged options to be taken into consideration when rendering output.

member.name: T:C1.Blazor.Grid.GridRowColRangesConverter
member.summary: Represents a TypeConverter that converts from a string to a C1OrderedSet
